body:
During `build`, nvidia-docker doesn't do anything (i.e. you can't have GPU access). You told me this line is to workaround a problem you had at build time:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/13399#issuecomment-333637487

But it looks like the line afterwards is missing an `export`, otherwise `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` won't be available for the configure script.
